title: Pipe Spring National Monument: Rice Grass
body: Rice Grass        Indian Ricegrass    Â    Ricegrass is a perennial bunchgrass 8 to 30 inches tall. It grows in the spring. Flowering occurs April to June. The seeds were ground up into a type of flour by the Paiute and other Native American Tribes. The elevation range is 2000 to 7000 feet.
